Quiz.question: 1 Part II: Executing the Response Select the correct answer, then click Done. For assistance, click the Lifeline. Based on the assumption that there may have been a biological release, which of the available sampling equipment, listed here, should you use to collect bulk samples from the fire extinguisher and the duct work during your team's second entry? Dry Filter Unit RADeCO Quicksilver Kit XMX Liquid Impinger 3
